channel.title: In the Money
channel.description: The R rated sports talk show you've been looking for.

image.title: In the Money
image.description: Fantasy Football Advice, Comedy Sketches, Celebrity Interviews, and R-Rated Sports Talk...

channel.itunes:author: Brock Riney & Phil Clay
channel.itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Football talk with feedback on listener emails, smack talk, and a hint of sarcasm.
channel.itunes:summary: Fantasy Football talk with feedback on listener emails, smack talk, and a hint of sarcasm.

item.title: In the Money Episode 65
item.description: Brock's Final show as a host. I know I was really late this week.... sorry. This week we tackle the usual shit and even throw in a new type of weird trivia and an interview. Enjoy, bitches!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 64
item.description: Sorry the audio is a little weird this week... long story.... anywho, this week the guys finally get around to giving their thoughts on the superbowl, play a couple of ridiculous games, talk about the NFL coaching carousel, annoying drugged up kids, the new Today Show lineup, some NBA stuff, Gilbert Arenas talking shit, and gayness in sports. Enjoy, bitches!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 62
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 1-16-07. No bikinis like we discussed; that's coming up on Super Bowl week. Brock returns this week so the 3 of us can bitch, argue, and yell about family feuds in boxing, Schottenheimer's job security, the badass-ness of Gilbert Arenas, third basemen, shitty NBA teams, Captain Clutch Kicker, old race car drivers, the lovely Sammy Sosa, C-Webb, the NFL playoffs, and we throw in a new game and play a new episode of "Who Am I?"

item.title: In the Money Episode 61
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 1.11.06. Brock is still MIA (which is a nice way of saying that he's doing creative things in an alley for smack), so Phil and Aaron bullshit this week about coaches' attire, the Hall of Fame, the National Title Game, the fact that Phil predicted the Heisman winner and National Champ, TO, poor athletes being beaten by their wives, as well as some analysis of the NFL playoffs. We also throw in the debut of the exciting game: "Does it Have a Penis?"

item.title: In the Money Episode 60
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 1.4.06. Only 2 of us made it back from the holidays for our first show of 2007. Phil and Aaron ramble on about all kinds of shit this week, including rape, the NFL Playoffs, possible NBA playoff contenders, homicide, crazy college games, gay QBs who date playmates, and we play an exciting game of "Would You Rather."

item.title: In the Money Episode 59
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 12-13-06. All 3 of us are here to babble and bitch about Gyroball, David Stern and Steve Nash, the Seahawks apparently trying to be cursed, AI needing a place to call home, Stupid Bonds, Tory Smith holding up an airplane with his heisman, and stupid drunken NASCAR drivers. We also analyze the last week of the NFL and try to figure out who is gonna make the playoffs. We play an interesting game of trivia, and predict this week's NFL action, as well as EVERY bowl game. Enjoy Bitches!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 58
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 12-6-06. Just Phil and Aaron this week. The 2 of us jibber jabber about all kinds of bullshit including the final BCS rankings, our example of a possible playoff system, MLB signings, NFL Playoff possibilities and predictions, the Pro Bowl possibly going international, stubborn ass David Stern, the Heisman race (if there is one). We also invite Phil's Girlfriend (the real one, not inflatable) to participate in the pick em contest, and show you the gayest Tom Brady video EVER!! Enjoy, Bitches!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 57
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 11-28-06 with special guest, Jordan, who once kicked a 37 yarder at Texas Stadium! This week the four of us talk an absolute shit load of NFL and Fantasy Football. We also cover possible bowl matchups, some college hoops, some MLB Stuff, and we play some "FROM?!" Trivia and pick all this weeks NFL and College Action against the spread. And Brock also makes himself so sick that he has to leave early. Enjoy, Bitches...

item.title: In the Money Episode 56
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 11-21-06. Hope all you bitches had a happy Thanksgiving... sorry the show got up late. Anywho, this week we debate the NFL Playoff picture, the BCS title game (again), classy coaching attire (love the suit, Del Rio!), cover some early season NBA headlines, play a quick game of "Who Am I?", take a look at some of the MLB Hot Stove signings, debate the validity of the MVPs and Cy Youngs, Play a game of Phil's Stupid Trivia, give you a ton of fantasy football updates and advice, and pick all the NFL and Big-Time College games against the spread in our Pick Em Contest.

item.title: In the Money Episode 55
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 11-14-06. Brock return this week so that the 3 of us can bitch and ramble about the BCS, the NFL Playoff picture, Stupid Basketball Coaches, the usual fantasy advice, Japanese pitchers, Dancing with the Stars, old ass QBs, and we play a couple of your favorite quiz games!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 54
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 11-7-06. Brock is replaced this week with special guest Mike, who admittedly knows nothing about sports, so that's fun! The 3 of us babble about fire marshall rules, Doogie Howser going down on men, the start of the NBA season, the BCS Title Game possibilities, Joe-Pa on the DL, the new NBA basketball, Ricky Williams staying in Canadia, a lot of NFL stuff, fantasy football analysis, the crazy ass SEC, the shitty Pac-10, and we play a game of "Would You Rather?," and the weekly Pick Em contest. We also feature the soothing sounds of Canadian music. Enjoy, Bitches!

item.title: In the Money Episode 53
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 11-1-06. This week we cover all kinds of shit: We Predict the NBA Champs, talk about College Football, the NFL, look at all possible fantasy matchups for the week, and we play a game of "Who Am I?" and a game of "FROM?!" Trivia. Enjoy, Bitches!

item.title: In the Money Episode 52
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 10.18.06. A whole lot of fun this week! We bring back our favorite interview guest, Vince Young, to talk about his first NFL win. We do all the usual stuff such as Phil's College Football Lines of the week, our weekly Pick Em Contest, making fun of ARod, predicting the World Series, and our expert fantasy football advice. Sprinkle in a crazy game of "FROM?!" trivia, and you get our 13th best show ever!! Enjoy, bitches!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 51
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 10.11.06 with special Beaner guest, Gilbert. The 4 of us yell and cuss about the LCS, tragic plane crashes, college football, ranking the NFL, advertising whores, and, of course, shootings at strip clubs. Due to popular demand, we also have an encore edition of the "Who Am I?" game. We also do the usual stuff, like fantasy football picks, Phil's lines of the week, and the pick em contest.

item.title: In the Money Episode 50
item.description: Our Golden Anniversary!! Apparently Phil brought children with him to celebrate. Recorded and broadcasted live on 10/4/06. The baseball playoffs have started, so we take a look at the first round and make our useless predictions. We also do our weekly stuff: Fantasy Football plays, listener e-mails, pick em contest, and Phil's College Lines O' the Week. We also play a new little quiz game that you should enjoy.

item.title: In the Money Episode 49
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 9/27/06. I promise we get the TO talk out of the way quickly. Then we move on to more important shit- like Barry F-ing Bonds and the Damn Astros. Then it gets really exciting, because Phil tells you who to bet on, and we bicker about who's good and bad for Fantasy Football this weekend. Then we top it off with the most exciting trivia ever and our weekly NFL Pick 'Em Contest. Hope you enjoy it as much as the kids with down syndrome that wrote us letters!

item.title: In the Money Episode 48
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 9/19/06. This week we BS about horrible college officiating, Fav-Ra bailing on his teammates, Pete Rose's latest publicity stunt, the NL West and MVP races, Radio's PT, pissing in coffee, Brady Quinn's Heisman chances, and Parcells' bitch tits. We also talk about last week's College and NFL action, as well as look forward to next week, answer some fantasy e-mails from you guys, play some trivia, tell you who to sit and start this week, and introduce a stupid new game from Phil.

item.title: In the Money Episode 47
item.description: A whole lot of football this week. You'll get your usual college football winning lines from Phil, a little trivia, one of Aaron's little bits, and a whole lot of fantasy analysis!!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 46
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 9/5/06. Brock is back from his honeymoon, so the 3 guys bullshit about the first weekend of college football, Toothlessberger's newest injury, Tiger being Tiger, USA's bronze medal, and some CFL guy. We also predict the first week of the NFL, and give some fantasy football analysis. And, as usual, Phil gives you the College Football lines of the week.

item.title: In the Money Episode 45
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 8/29/06. While Brock is cruisin around the Caribbean on his honeymoon, Phil and Aaron talk about the promise of Carson Palmer, the demise of Brett Fav-Ra, the feud of TO and Parcells, the return of Don Nelson, the streak of Willie Tavares, the incarceration of Greg Anderson, and the pussiness of A-Rod and Man-Ram. We also discuss the signing of Kerry Collins and Jeff George, plea bargains, Phil predicts the entire NFL regular season and reviews his big money fantasy draft. We also talk a little College Football, a little Tiger, and play 2 of Aaron's ridiculous games.

item.title: In the Money Episode 44
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 8/22/06. This week we babble about Brock's bachelor party, the TO situation, the new MNF crew, the damn Yanks/Sox, Junior Seau, USA Hoops, LeBron- the billionaire, NFL News and notes, answer a few listener e-mails about heir fantasy teams, predict Tiger's future, re-do some college football picks, have some stupid trivia, and Phil sits down with everyone's favorite movie star, Mel Gibson.

item.title: In the Money Episode 43
item.description: NO BROCK THIS WEEK!!! Recorded and broadcasted live on 8/9/06, Phil and Aaron BS about the OU scandal, USA Basketball, another Bengal arrested, unbreakable records, Yanks/Sox, Coors Field Jelly Balls, Illegal Sausages, the legality of Fantasy Baseball, true "aces," we play Aaron's game "Athlete Excuse or Girlfriend Apology" with special guest, Lisa, we also dream about being NFL Commissioner, run over the NFL infirmary report, make fun of holdouts, and predict some College Football!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 42
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted LIVE on 8/1/06, We evaluate the moves made at the trade deadline, make fun of Derek Jeter's stench, Participate in ridiculous trivia written be a feminine man, laugh at Danica's cute little fit, and have exciting discussions about NFL training camps and Fantasy Football!

item.title: In the Money Episode 41
item.description: Just a discussion about Phil and Brock's upcoming fantasy football draft, and a debate about standardizing fantasy rules. We'll be back with a full length show LIVE on Tuesday, 8/1/06 at 10:30 p.m. CST.

item.title: In the Money Episode 40
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 7/17/06, we talk about the start of baseball's second half, trade deadline stuff, the ridiculousness of the ESPYs, Keith Davis getting shot (again), Big Ben, Kobe, Zo, Barbaro, and US Soccer. Phil also gets robbed in trvia by a man wearing capris!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 39
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 7/10/06, we talk about NBA Free Agency. MLB All-Star selection, the Home Run Derby, Predict the rest of the season, Wrap up the World Cup, Predict the NFL Season, analyze Fantasy QBs, and, once again, Brock gets SMOKED in Trivia!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 38
item.description: Recorded and broadcasted live on 7/3/06, we talk about NBA Free Agency and the Draft, Interview a true NASCAR fan, bitch about the All-Star Selections, have a laugh about Jose Canseco, the 2 dipshits duke it out in trivia, check in with Richard in Germany at the World Cup, and do some fantasy RB analysis.

item.title: In the Money Episode 37
item.description: Recorded and Broadcasted Live on 6/26. This week we cry about the NBA Finals, scout out the draft, bash some soccer officials, check with our correspondent in Germany, touch on the College World Series, interview Avery Johnson, and finally get to discuss Fantasy Football again!!

item.title: In the Money Episode 36
item.description: Recorded live on 6/19 with guest Devo, we incorrectly pick the NBA Finals, check in with our World Cup correspondent in Germany, discover that the Whale won the Stanley Cup, and Phil's reign as trivia master finally comes to an end... for now.

item.title: In the Money Episode 35
item.description: Recorded Live on 6/12/06. This week we bitch and ramble about Steroids/HGH, Fantasy Baseball, Big Ben, Marcus Vick, Steve McNair, the NBA Finals, Trivia, and a report from our World Cup Correspondent, Richard.

item.title: In the Money Episode 34
item.description: Recorded live on 6/5/06, we predict the NBA finals, sleeper fantasy RBs, Albert Pujols, Restraining Orders, Michelle Wie, the NFC East, stupid NCAA regulations, redneck quarterbacks, the art of Fellatio and Phil interviews Cincinnati's favorite drunkass.

item.title: In the Money Episode 33
item.description: Recorded live on 5/29, Avery Johnson Interview, we talk about the Conf. Finals, Ricky Williams in the CFL, Stupid Barry Bonds, and surprise, surprise, and Phil wins trivia again... even though it was rigged

item.title: In the Money Episode 32
item.description: Joined by special NBA Analyst/Doogie Howser look-alike, Bob!! We take a look at the NBA Conf Finals, Hot Female Athletes, Reggie Bush, Fantasy Baseball, and other stupid stuff...

item.title: In the Money Episode 31
item.description: Our first show recorded LIVE!!! We discuss the ugliest people in sports, the NBA Playoffs, Stupid Bonds, Randy Johnson, Fantasy Baseball, NFL, M. Wie, Hazing rituals, and pot smoking running backs.

item.title: In the Money Episode 30
item.description: Phil says n**ger!! Barry Bonds, Delmon Young, Hot Starts, Fantasy Baseball, Brock's Stupid Trivia, NBA Playoffs (feat. an interview with Samuel L. Jackson), NFL News and Notes, and some other fun crap I forgot to mention here.

item.description: Baseball, Football, Basketball, Stupid trivia

item.title: In the Money Episode 23
item.description: Special Guest Aaron Smith. Lots of baseball, NFL, Phil's stupid trivia, & favorite sports video games.

item.title: In the Money Episode 22
item.description: Phil & Special Guest Host "Gamblor" a.k.a. Trey, help you fill out your NCAA Brackets. NFL free agency, Phil's stupid poker story, Phil's stupid trivia, & the World Baseball Classic.

item.title: In the Money Episode 21
item.description: Interview with Jerry Jones. Fantasy Baseball, Basketball and more!
